summary: The package implements a complete Cartesian Genetic Programming (CGP) framework. It defines genotype representations, node abstractions, and primitive operations, and provides mechanisms for creating, mutating, and evaluating populations of individuals. High‑level APIs orchestrate Mu+Lambda evolution, while utilities support backend‑agnostic execution (NumPy, PyTorch, SymPy) and caching of intermediate results.
business_intent: Enable automated design and optimization of computational graphs for tasks such as symbolic regression, program synthesis, and neural architecture search, offering a flexible, reusable evolutionary engine that can be integrated into data‑science and AI pipelines.
